name: 8Jump
description:
Play as a little man that is running through maps with sharp spikes and small platforms. Try to make it to the waving end flag. Make sure to pick up all of the coins to see to unlock the super special bonus level. This was made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam.

Theme: Rewind

This game fits this theme because all of the art is rewound to old N.E.S graphics having 2 colors and a small 8-bit art style.

  • 14 Levels and one bonus level
  • HTML5
  • Mac version
  • Windows version
  • Linux version
